phrs.translation: 披萨饺, 薄饼饺, 批萨盒子, 匹萨盒子
意大利乳清干酪和半圆型烤乳酪火腿馅饼
包入番茄酱和奶酪烤制披萨

sentences.sentence: The highlight of your evening is the hotdog with remoulade or the calzone from 7/11 at the end of the night-end of the night being the arrival of the first bus in the morning!
sentences.translation: 你一晚上最精彩的部分是：在夜晚快要结束时吃着从7-11买的蛋黄酱热狗或者馅饼——夜幕即将揭开，清晨第一班公交车要来了！

sentences.sentence: BIT-chain has been well known for a long time in Oslo for their delicious sandwiches and calzone, as well as for a cool industrial open kitchen interior design that the owner did himself.
sentences.translation: 在挪威奥斯陆，BIT在很长一段时间内以其美味的三明治和烤乳酪馅饼而闻名，同样的，其装饰富有特征的开放式厨房以及室内设计，也是由快餐厅老板自己设计制作。
